name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vice Versa - fixing bilingual keyboard typing mistakes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert selected text between Hebrew and English directly in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vice Versa allows you to seamlessly convert selected text between Hebrew and English with a single click. The extension operates locally, requiring no internet connection, ensuring your privacy. With its simple interface and efficient functionality, Vice Versa is perfect for everyday use.
